title: Anyone else not enjoying LoL after the update?
body:
So i'm at the point where i cant decide if i enjoy League anymore after these updates.

I was enjoying it immensely and now i think these changes have somewhat ruined the game.

replies.body:
Just stick with it for a bit. It will get way better after a couple of patches and they balance the game out.

No one is making you stay though.
yes fuck riot they ruined the game

League was fun but rito made all the hardwork go down the drain with this patch.I was already happy with the season 5 set.
With their "balancing assassin" bullshit and meanwhile they buff adcs really hard.
Also not to mention rito hates zed so much
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=89t1BTycYis
